body:
Hi!

[libexpat 2.4.4](https://github.com/libexpat/libexpat/releases/tag/R_2_4_4) with **security fixes** has been released, the upstream [change log](https://github.com/libexpat/libexpat/blob/R_2_4_4/expat/Changes) has more details.

Thanks for updating! :pray: 

Best, Sebastian
title: expat: Add latest release 2.4.4 with security fixes
